content.p: Our general switchboard will point you in the right direction, whatever your query. To speak to someone at the following four campuses, call our switchboard on +44 (0)115 951 5151 Queen's Medical Centre Nottingham, NG7 2UH United Kingdom +44 (0)115 924 9924 School of Medicine B Floor, Nottingham Medical School Queen's Medical Centre Nottingham, NG7 2UH United Kingdom +44 (0)115 823 0209 Clinical Science Building Nottingham City Hospital Hucknall Road Nottingham, NG5 1PB United Kingdom +44 (0)115 969 1169, ext. 34784 Royal Derby Hospital Uttoxeter Road Derby, DE22 3DT United Kingdom +44 (0)1332 724 900 +60 3 8924 8000 +86 574 8818 0000 If you have a question, please call us or alternatively, use our enquiry form and we will reply to you soon. If you have a question or need assistance please contact us via Live chat or complete our enquiry form. Any updates on your application or course will be sent to you via email. Security at the University Alumni Social media hub Call +44 115 951 5559 Email about open days Call +44 115 951 5559 Email about offer-holder events Trouble logging in? You should have received your username and password via email. If you have not received these, call the Student Recruitment Support Hub on +44 (0)115 951 5559. If you know your username, reset your password. If you have a question, use our enquiry form and we will reply to you soon. You can also contact our international team directly. A-Z index telephone: +44 (0) 115 951 5151 fax: +44 (0) 115 951 3666
